Module jbubblebobble.jbubblebobble

Package jbubblebobble.view

package jbubblebobble.view
Contains the classes that are responsible for the view of the game. The classes in this package are responsible for the view of the game. They contain the images of the game objects and the rendering logic of the game.
  • Class
    Description
    BubbleView
    The class Bubble view is a container for the images of the bubbles.
    EnemyBubbleView
    The class Enemy bubble view is a container for the images of the enemy bubble.
    Flyweight
    Flyweight class that creates and stores images in a map to avoid creating the same image multiple times.
    GhostView
     
    LevelView
    the class LevelView Draws the level on the canvas and updates the level when the observable object is changed
    MonsterView
    Class MonsterView is a container for the images of the monster enemy.
    PlayerView
    Class PlayerView is a container for the images of the player.
    PowerUpView
    Class PowerUpView is a container for the images of the power ups.
    Renderable
    The interface Renderable implements the render methods for the entities, power ups and walls.
    WallView
    Class WallView is a container for the images of the walls.
    ZenChanView
    The class Zen chan view is a container for the images of the Zen chan enemy.
